          Top 4 Game Time Bundles

          Discover champion size savings with display/audio combos guaranteed to make this season unforgettable.

          1. The Touchdown

          Take your entertainment experience all the way by adding epic picture performance and superior sound to your living room stadium. Catch game-changing savings when you bundle the 80” SmartCast™ Display
          with the 45” 5.1 Sound Bar.

          $3,899.98* $3,049.98 (Save $850*)

          Shop Bundle

          Bundle Details

          The All-New 2017 VIZIO SmartCast™ E-Series 80” Class Ultra HD HDR XLED™ Display

          $3,399.99*

          VIZIO SmartCast™ 45” 5.1 Sound Bar System

          $499.99*

          Why Do I Need a Sound Bar?

          The reason is fairly simple: As TVs/Displays have slimmed down, the space available for powerful audio electronics has been significantly reduced. To compensate, VIZIO recommends getting a sound bar - an easy and inexpensive way to enhance your home theater experience. Sound bars are able to pack multiple speakers and room-shaking bass into a sleek, all-in-one design that easily connects to your TV/Display. Bring powerful, crystal clear audio to your entertainment space today with the addition of a VIZIO Sound Bar.

          2. The Field Goal

          Score points with the home team by adding breathtaking picture quality and room-shaking bass to the roster. Get the 75” SmartCast™ Display and the 45” 5.1 Sound Bar for an undefeated price.

          $2,999.98* $2,299.99 (Save $699.99*)

          Shop Bundle
